description.text: A pirate anime streaming site that focuses on streaming high quality, very heavy .mp4 media from my own server at home. The site is built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS for the frontend, and Node.js with Express for the backend. It includes user authentication with Strapi, and a recommendation system based on user watch history.

A complete password manager app bult with React JS, TypeScrpt, and Material UI for the frontend, and Laravel with MySQL as the backend. Ths app includes role managements for users, premium functions, payments handling wth PayPal and Coinbase. The app synchronizes all the stored passwords of the users across al the users' registered devices.
A prgressive Web Aplication for studying Japanese language. This app was built using React JS and a layout for Reactstrap.
